name: Hipodromo
description:
Hipodromo

---------

Horse betting game. The goal is to get to the end of the day with money in your pocket, 
so you can go to the next racecourse. The game is infinite (as long as it does not crash), 
simply play and last as many days and earn more money. I hope you enjoy it.

Technical data
--------------

This game was developed using C++ and javidx9's olcConsoleGameEngine.h.
http://www.onelonecoder.com
